text: I'll never forget this game's intro on the Frigate, it was such a perfect way to set the mood and introduce the gameplay mechanics. Ending it with the fight against the Parasite Queen was cherry on the top. I'm very happy that Retro is working on MP4 despite the delays, I expect nothing else than an amazing adventure. I wonder if we'll see even a small teaser at the upcoming Video Game Awards, but I'm not expecting it.
author: SupraDarky

text: You'll update this comment, after the Game Awards, right? c:
author: The VGM Lover

text: â€‹@The VGM Lover Yes, if it does show up I'll edit my original comment and say "We will absolutely see a teaser at the upcoming VGAs, I can guarantee it as per my close sources to Retro Studios". And then I'll delete this.
